title: Hyper G2
summary: The Hyper G2 is a tier 2 semi-automatic pistol that can be found in marketplaces. It can be upgraded into the Hyper X9.
full_text:
Hyper G2
The Hyper G2 is a tier 2 semi-automatic pistol that can be found in marketplaces. It can be upgraded into the Hyper X9.
